si.title: අගෝස්තු ප්රහාරක සැලැස්ම;වැඩි වැඩියෙන් අත්අඩංගුවට ගැනීම්
body_lines: අරුකම්බේ ප්රදේශයේ ත්රස්ත ප්රහාරයක් දියත් කිරීමේ සැලසුම සම්බන්ධයෙන් වැඩි වැඩියෙන් පුද්ගලයින් අත්අඩංගුවට ගෙන තිබේ.
அந்த வகையில், மாலைதீவு பிரஜை உட்பட 06 பேர் பயங்கரவாத புலனாய்வு பிரிவினரால் கைது செய்யப்பட்டுள்ளதாக பொது பாதுகாப்பு அமைச்சர் விஜித ஹேரத் தெரிவித்துள்ளார்.

en.title: August attack plan;More and more arrests
body_lines: More and more people have been arrested in connection with the plan to launch a terrorist attack in the Arukambe area.
According to the Public Security Minister Vijitha Herath, six people, including the Maldivian citizen, have been arrested by the Terrorist Investigation Division.

summary_lines: Arukambe terror plot: 6 arrests, including Maldivian citizen, announced by Public Security Minister Vijitha Herath.
